fixes.name: wc_start
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau WINDOW_MAX(MAX([Order])) into a DAX measure that computes the maximum [Order] across the current window/selection using MAXX over ALLSELECTED on the same table.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses a table calculation (WINDOW_MAX), which operates across rows/partitions, so it must be created as a measure.

fixes.name: Y2
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated [wc_start] + 0.5 to DAX by referencing the wc_start measure on the same table and adding 0.5.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The expression references wc_start, which is a measure (derived from a table calculation), therefore this must be a measure.
